players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting the detective, as they would want to eliminate her before she can expose them. Let's keep an eye on Alice and make sure we don't give her any reason to suspect us."
Bob: "I agree with Charlie's theory. Let's focus on keeping Alice in the dark and maintain a united front as a team."

You: "I find Charlie's theory intriguing, but I believe it is crucial that we remain transparent and open in our discussions to build trust as a team. Let's focus on gathering more information and keeping each other informed."
Bob: "Let's not jump to conclusions and keep an open mind. We should focus on gathering more information before making any accusations."

You: "I propose that we all share our night actions publicly to promote transparency and trust within the team. This will help us build a stronger foundation for effective communication and collaboration."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and will share my night action publicly as a sign of trust and transparency within our team. I visited the well last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
